Class Plugin

      • addModule

        public void addModule(Module module)
        Adds a Module to the plug-in. If the Module is already loaded and added in, IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        module - The Module to add to the plug-in.

      • removeModule

        public void removeModule(Module module)
        Removes a Module from the plug-in.
        Parameters:
        module - The Module to remove.

      • getModule

        public Module getModule(java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:
        name - The String name of the Module.
        Returns:
        Returns the Module with the given String name. If no Module in the plug-in has the name given, null is returned.

      • getModule

        public <T extends Module> T getModule(java.lang.Class<? extends Module> clazz)
        Parameters:
        clazz - The Java Class of the Module.
        Returns:
        Returns the Module instance of the Java Class given. If no Module loaded in the plug-in is of the Class given, null is returned.

      • setLoadClasses

        public void setLoadClasses(boolean flag)
        Set the plug-in to load the classes in the Jar File. This is an option for embedded plug-ins.
        Parameters:
        flag - The Flag to set.

      • getModules

        public java.util.Collection<Module> getModules()
        Returns:
        Returns a Collection of the Modules registered and loaded in the plug-in.
